title: Manhattan Project National Historical Park: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions & Transportation       Hanford, Washington  No private vehicle access to the B-Reactor Tours begin and end at the Manhattan Project NHP Interim Visitor Center, 2000 Logston Boulevard, Richland, WA, 99354. Phone: 509-376-1647 Directions: Take State Highway 240 North. Turn left on Logston Blvd. Building is on the right, with a red roof. More information about the Hanford site  Oak Ridge, Tennessee   No private vehicle access Tours available through the American Museum of Science and Energy, located at 300 S. Tulane Ave, Oak Ridge, TN 37830 Phone: 865-576-6767 Directions: Directions to the American Museum of Science and Energy  More information about the Oak Ridge site    Los Alamos, New Mexico  Los Alamos Visitor Contact Station is at 475 20th Street in Los Alamos. Phone: 505-661-6277 Directions: In Los Alamos, take Central Avenue or 502/Trinity Drive to 20th Street. More information about the Los Alamos site
